chunks: IN THE HON'BLE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM (Original Jurisdiction) In the matter of the Companies Act, 1956 and IN THE MATTER OF Mis. KANDCO POLYMERS LTD (IN LIQUIDATION) Co.Pet. No : 29/2006 E-AUCTION NOTICE In pursuance of the Hon'ble High Court order dated 27.3.2025 passed in Official Liquidator's Report No.80 online competitive bids are hereby invited for re-sale of below described assets through e-auction scheduled on 21.5.2025 from 14.00 hours to 17.00 hours on "AS rs WHERE rs AND WHATEVER THERE IS BASIS". The entire e-auction catalogue ie. "Terms and conditions" of sale containing the schedules for giving full particulars of event of e-auction, guidelines for online registration etc are available on Rail Tel Corporation of India Ltd website: www.railtelindia.com and can be viewed by clicking on the following URL of https://olauction.enivida.com and Ministry's website at www.mca.gov.in. Inspection of the assets can be had at the premises situated in Survey No.12/2E in Kannur Village at Industrial Development Plot, Anandapuram, Manjeswaram taluk in Kasargod district on 2.5.2025 between 10 a.m to 4 p.m. The Official Liquidator subject to the orders of the Hon'ble High Court of Kerala reserves the right to accept or reject the highest offer and also put the assets for resale. The EMD as above need to be paid through online mode on or before 15.5.2025 Lot Description of Properties EMD Upset No. Rs. Price Rs I Landed property of the company( in liqn) to the extent of 2 acres comprised in Survey No.12/2E in 10,00,000 97,98,500 Kannur Village at Industrial Development Plot, Anandapuram, Manjeswaram Taluk in Kasargod district with all building and compound wall thereon 1 The intending bidders may contact Sri.Gagan T.S., Sr.Manager, M/s.RailTel Corporation of India, Bengaluru on Mobile No: 8448288987/89 & Smt..Sujatha 8448288994/86 for doubts/clarifications, if any, on the e-auction procedure and Smt. Gigi Anand, Official of the office of the Official Liquidator during office hours on Mobile No: 9947442731 between 9 a.m.to 5.30 p.m for details about the properties. Dated at Kerala this 9" day of April, 2025. OFFICIAL IDATOR High Cout ofKerala Co rate Bhavan rd 1 3 Foor, B.M.C.Road, Thrikkakara P.O., Kochi - 21 Phone No.2422889(O) 2
